**Liquid Nitrogen Rental and Supply Contract Request for Proposal**
==============================

### Advertisement Details
----------------------

*   **Public Tender Notice Title**: Liquid Nitrogen Rental and Supply Contract Request for Proposal
*   **Reference Number**: RFP23-58214
*   **Publication Date**: 08/02/2024
*   **Closing Date**: 11/03/2024, 16:00:00 EST
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services - G
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
*

### Eligibility Requirements and Awarding Criteria
-------------------------------------------------

The procurement process will follow the competitive tendering route. Vendors will be awarded on the basis of their submitted bid, with consideration given to the lowest price offered.

### Goods and Services Requirements
---------------------------------

Contract requirements include the supply and delivery of liquid nitrogen (Ln2), a telemetric system, and the rental of a 3,000-gallon tank. The Contractor will also need to provide monthly usage reports to the Technical Authority. The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking a new contractor to replace the current one (Linde), as the contract is nearing its end.

### Key Deliverables
---------------------

The successful vendor must provide:

>> Liquid Nitrogen (Ln2)      
>> Telemetric System
>> 3,000-gallon Tank Rental
>>  Delivery of Liquid Nitrogen (Ln2)
>>  Monthly Usage Reports

### Complementary Documents
------------------------------

Further details and supporting documents can be download from: [CanadaBuys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca,sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/31612/rfp23-58214\_vendor\_08feb2024.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/31612/rfp23-58214\_qaaddendum\_06mar2024\_en.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/31612/rfp23-58214-1\_amendment\_liquidnitrogen\_15feb2024\_en.pdf]
